issuetype.name: Bug

resolution.description: A fix for this issue is checked into the tree and tested.
resolution.name: Fixed

fields.summary: Add a metric for number of encryption zones

status.description: A resolution has been taken, and it is awaiting verification by reporter. From here issues are either reopened, or are closed.
status.name: Resolved

status.description: A resolution has been taken, and it is awaiting verification by reporter. From here issues are either reopened, or are closed.
status.name: Resolved

fields.description: This bug was caused by the fact that we did HDFS-10458 from trunk to branch-2.7, but we did HDFS-8721 initially up to branch-2.8. So from branch-2.8 and up, the order is HDFS-8721 -> HDFS-10458. But in branch-2.7, we have the reverse order. Hence the inconsistency.

comments.body: [~zhz] I have uploaded a patch. Please take a look.

Thanks [~redvine]. Is the patch based on branch-2.7? If so could you rename it so Yetus knows how to apply it?

Based on HowToContribute it should be something like HDFS-10809-branch-2.7.00.patch

Thanks Vinitha. +1 on the patch. Reported test failures are not related and I verified that none can be reproduced locally. I'm committing the patch to branch-2.7 soon.
Just committed the patch. Thanks [~redvine] for the contribution.
Thanks [~zhz]. I could not reproduce the test failures locally as well.
